name: To The Dogs
description:
GoGodot Jam prototype

I ran out of time. 

There should be a whole story about being a puppy, growing big, saving the infected by a nano-virus robots. 

I couldn't even finish one gameplay loop. Just moving around.

But I learned a lot so thanks Gogodot jam and Redefine GameDev!!  

Just thought i'd share it anyways.  If you have any questions just contact me.
